评论详情: This was a great shirt for our Christmas pjs. Good quality and great design. I bought one for all of our family members. Sizing was true to size. Comfortable and made it through the first wash. No issues or concerns. I’d buy again.
true to size and super soft. I ordered in different colors for my family to wear as pjs on Christmas, they loved them!
The material is so soft and breathable. After washing and drying the design has stayed intact.
Shipping was quick, arrived on time. Perfect fit very comfortable we love  the color,  perfect for our Disney family trip
The photos make this shirt look like a cute women's cut t-shirt, but it actually just fits like a basic men's or unisex t-shirt.
Material is soft and comfortable. Color and Design are just as pictured. I really like it

I bought these shirts in 3 different colors to match with my family on our latest visit to Disney. They are very well made, SO SOFT, and the fit is great! I sized up one size to get a more oversized look, but they fit just right which tells me they may need to be sized up in general. The colors were nice and bright, and after two cycles in the washer and dryer they still look new, so they wash great. It was thick enough to wear in December but not too thick that we were baking in the sun. Highly recommend!
Very thin material. Felt cheap.
Bought this for my 6 year old daughter for our upcoming Disney trip. Super cute and soft. Size small and it fits her perfectly
Was bigger than a normal medium size
It’s cute, but a very boxy fit. I’d size down. This doesn’t seem like a woman’s cut to me. The fabric is soft and unfortunately doesn’t shrink much.

I LOVE this T-shirt! BUT...... it is not a disney brand or a recognized brand. I wear a 2xxl, 2x, & 3x. This fits more like a XL. It's also slinky feeling lots of stretch and a very nice quality material. I really wish it was true to size.
Very happy with what I ordered. Super soft shirt, size is as expected, color is vibrant, print is adorable, and exactly as expected. Way better than wasting money on a shirt in the park!
I liked the color of the shirt, runs small, and it smelled like old lady perfume or moth balls.  Almost if it was a returned shirt
Purchased for upcoming trip to Disney. Love the print and very soft.

Very cute, but after 2nd wash and dry, the design stuck together and pieces pulled off shirt.  There are no care instructions on the shirt but I'd recommend having your dryer on low and removing immediately
Very cute and soft shirt but runs pretty big and there is no xs available
Love this shirt. It fit great and when ever I wear it someone also compliment the shirt. The shirt is soft. Love the color of it.
Right color size

Shirt has a beautiful color and no fading after multiple washes. So comfortable and fit perfectly. Material thickness was great and kept me cozy all day at the Disney parks in mid summer during my first trimester of pregnancy!
Loved this shirt for Disney World. It is light and true to size.
I thought the shirt was cute but the Small fit more like a Medium and it kind of hung on me.  I had to return it.
Material is very soft and the graphic is clear and as pictured.

1/7/25 UpdateTshirt is no longer wearable after 4x.. I initially liked the thinner soft material but after a couple wears it just began show alot of wear and thinning of the material.  I wore it 4x since purchase so I guess I hit my value out if it, but I will be more careful if thinner materials in the futureI love graphic tee shirts, especiallyn ones like this that are made very well.  The material is soft and comfortable.  No added skrinkage after laundering.  The graphis are perfect!
Was great, just a little tight. Hoping doesn’t shrink anymore when washed. Otherwise material was nice and quality of print great. I would suggest ordering a size up.
Fit exactly like it said and material comfortable
very pretty, bright red, good quality and adequate size.
This was a hit at Epcot. Loved the design and fit great
Very comfortable! Excited to wear for all the Christmas parties. It’s a true to size shirt and a perfect red color. Love my Mickey!
This was a great buy! Super cute, comfy, lightweight.
Cute shirt. Wore to Disney. Great fit.
Love this shirt.  The material is so soft

Loved this shirt. I wore it to Disney Orlando and it was perfect. Great quality and fit. Soft and comfortable. Not too tight or loose. I tied a knot on the side just like the picture and it was perfect. Super cute! I'm 5'5, 140 lbs and ordered a medium. Still the same after machine washing. Hung to dry.
Cute, good quality, soft
The material is so soft and stretchy. True to size. Shirt washed really well and applique is perfect. Wonderful shirt for Christmas time or trip to Disney!
I love this shirt so much! It’s true to size. The quality is great and it’s soft. Perfect for casual wear and I can’t wait to wear it to Disney!
The material of this tshirt is way beyond me expectations. So super soft and breezy. Perfect for jeans or leggings! Works either way and I love it even more for that reason

I love this shirt.  I tried it on and, the fit is just right, the color is good and the graphic is nice.  I am not disappointed at all with this purchase.  I have not washed the shirt yet - it is in the washer.  I always wash any new clothing before I wear them.  If anything changes after it is washed - I will update my review!

This shirt is great! It’s soft, the fit is true to size and the image still looks great even after washing multiple times. Plus, there’s an added bonus of the kids trying to figure out who all the characters are while waiting in lines at Disney!

Material was soft but ended up returning because it was too thick for Florida in the summer. Color was true to the picture and fit was fine, maybe a touch boxy and graphic was a little on the small side, likely because I ordered an XL and the image on the site is probably a small.
The placement of the print on this shirt is super awkward- placed way too low on the shirt in my opinion. But it's so soft I decided to keep it anyway.
This shirt is a rag. The print is literally peeling already and it’s brand new. And the shape doesn’t look like a Mickey. Even if it was $5 I wouldn’t keep it.
Very soft, true to size. And the print is not the stiff iron on type that cracks . Very washable. Great t shirt!

This T-shirt was much softer than I was expecting. It is a really nice quality T-shirt. I absolutely love the Mickey logo and the detail with all the other characters inside of the logo. Very happy with this. Perfect for our frequent Disney trips.  I’m 5’7”, 200 lbs and I got a XL.  Fits good.
This shirt came as advertised and was a great shirt for my oldest to wear at Magic Kingdom.  It has also held up well after being washed several times.
Super soft and comfortable

Purchased for our upcoming Disney trip and I am very happy with this shirt! It fits great, material is very soft. The green is very a soft and a nice shade. The design seems to be put on well and did not fade after washing.
This shirt is very vibrant and soft. It is on the thinner side and does run big.
Fits true to size, and surprisingly soft and comfortable to wear in the Florida humidity.

I was very excited to find this shirt design, but was disappointed when I received the shirt. The white design feels ironed on and rough to the touch. I did not trust it to survive the washing machine, so returned it.
Cute shirt with nice soft material.

I loved the color of this shirt and it didn’t disappoint. Very light weight on the hot Disney day in Florida. Didn’t shrink in the wash and loved the design. I felt the quality was exactly as expected which was great for our trip to Disney!
Great quality, so soft and true to size. Fire amazing and it’s lightweight material. Perfect for Disney lovers

I liked that is was a comfortable material and true to size

Super cute. Love the material. Really soft. Great price. However I didn't like the way that it fit. It was really big under the arms and didn't lay right. It looked really weird the way that it fit. So I had to return it. Such a bummer. I really liked this shirt.  Also, when it came, it came in a clear see through bag. I thought that was really odd. Nobody needs to be able to see what is in my packages. Really poor on the shipper.

I bought this tank top & T-shirt for an upcoming trip to Disney. I'm very happy with the shirts, they're soft and very comfortable. Well worth what I paid for it. These are a medium, so it's true to size. I'm 5'1" and weight 127 lbs.
Feels nice, true to size
I love love love this color The tshirt is soft and breathable and color is super complimenting 10/10 would recommend

True to size. Material was super soft and the decal was placed well.

The color of the shirt was what I was looking for. However, the reason I am returning is because the sticker on the shirt came stuff together (a small fold in the middle) and I had to pull it apart.
